fulltext:
Trương Vĩnh Lộc
SOFTWARE QUALITY CONTROL ENGINEER
Objective
Take advantages of IT skills & experience and understanding of testing to become a
professional Quality Control Engineer and bring a lot value to company.
 Education
TROY UNIVERSITY
01/2012 - 01/2016
Bachelor of Computer Science
Mobile Programming
Applied Networking
Systems Analysis and Design
Computer Security
Object Oriented
Sep 16, 1993
 Male
 0908890321
 tvloc1993@gmail.com
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Work Experience
GYM
01/2015 - 01/2016
Part-time job
Guiding customer when they come to the gym, how to use the devices.Be available to answer
member questions.
DXC TECHNOLOGY (FORMER CSC VIETNAM)
6/2016 - NOW
Software Quality Control Engineer (Automation)
- Build, develop and maintain automation software testing tool, product about ServiceNow
product (IT Service Management).
- Manual testing, use user story and create test case manual and run by auto script.
- Make reports of automation testing every week. 
- Daily meeting with scrum team for discuss about testing process (demo to product owner
every 2 weeks).
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Experience in automation testing with Selenium Webdriver, Git (Web application).
- Experience in automation testing tool by Microsoft Visual Studio
- Understand deeply about testing (unit test, integration test, white-box test, black-box
test...e).
- Guiding for new members join to team (Mentor 1 on 1).
- Improve English Communication Skill. 

SKILLS
C#/C++
Java,
Manual/Automation Testing
Selenium Webdriver/Git

Teamwork

2015

Build some simple android application, for example: news reading, dictionary,
musicplayer...and design user interface.

2016
